explains: n. 汉堡包，夹心牛肉饼；（类似汉堡包的）馅饼
【名】 （Burger）（西）布尔赫尔，(法)比尔热，(英)伯格，（德、罗、捷、塞、匈）布格尔（人名）

sentences.en: You can have a burger, but you can't have fries as well.
sentences.cn: 你可以吃汉堡包，但不可以同时又吃炸薯条。

sentences.en: He's been forced into slave labour at burger bars to earn a bit of cash.
sentences.cn: 为了挣点小钱，他被迫到汉堡吧去打工。

sentences.en: In May, a judge ruled in favour of Burger King.
sentences.cn: 今年5月，一名法官做出了有利于汉堡王的裁决。
